TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_szy_ulic-_canan_ku_daesu, title = ulic-_canan_ku_daesu, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Sakizaya]}, url = {https://szy.wikipedia.org/wiki/ulic-_canan_ku_daesu} }

S.FORM: == ulic -canan ku daesu? == 文/幸福是什麼? lacul cacay u daesu sa, sawsaani icapi ititaanan. u daesu sa, caykaw heci nu uzip. mahiza bahal matepa i unikayzaan nu uzip. haymaw han mikilam i kasatezep nu uzip nu mita alawhani matepa kisu ku daesu isasa' nu kuku'isu,ipabaw nu lima isu. sisa, u daesu sa,caykaw salunganay, zumasatu caykaw daudaucay. nika matebing tu ilabuay a cekil atu lalum i ayzaay a uzip. u lihalay nu uzip. atu kinacikcikan nu uzip. lacul tusa matekesay atu bancalay a tuud, hakya caay kaw daesu, alahican u daesu mapicpicay . nika anu matatungus tu datengen isu, anu mahicahica? unikayda isu madaesuway, sakasaan u daesu hananay yanikaydan isu a lipahak. muazih tu tatengaay Hulam a kumu lacul cacay . lacul tusa ?

== olic -canan ko daeso? == 文/幸福是什麼? lacol cacay o daeso sa, sawsaani icapi ititaanan. o daeso sa, caykaw heci no ozip. mahiza bahal matepa i onikayzaan no ozip. haymaw han mikilam i kasatezep no ozip no mita alawhani matepa kiso ko daeso isasa' no koko'iso,ipabaw no lima iso. sisa, o daeso sa,caykaw salonganay, zomasato caykaw daodaocay. nika matebing to ilaboay a cekil ato lalom i ayzaay a ozip. o lihalay no ozip. ato kinacikcikan no ozip. lacol tosa matekesay ato bancalay a tood, hakya caay kaw daeso, alahican o daeso mapicpicay . nika ano matatongos to datengen iso, ano mahicahica? onikayda iso madaesoway, sakasaan o daeso hananay yanikaydan iso a lipahak. moazih to tatengaay Holam a komo lacol cacay . lacol tosa ?
